sections.title: Play button does not play the track (No audio)
sections.content:
Sonic visualiser requires PulseAudio to be set up to hear anything. For ALSA-only users, using apulseAUR as described in Advanced Linux Sound Architecture#apulse gets the audio working.

```
$ apulse sonic-visualiser
```

The terminal messages will still have WARNING: AudioFactory::createCallbackIO: Failed to open JACK I/O, but can be ignored. Audio should play with no issues.
